oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Rhea portrait
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: U.S. Representative from Tennessee, Rhea was born Ireland and practiced law. A War Hawk in Congress, Rhea urged the declaration of war against Great Britain in 1812.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rhea, John, 1753-1832;Legislators--United States;Navy--History--War of 1812
Legislators
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harrison, W.
